column4: Hello, I'm having issues with my pure-ftpd-server. I have created users and can access them from the machine itself. But I cannot access them from any other machine. I can however access the apache server from any machine. Any tips? My first time setting up a text-only server.
I think the pure-ftp is all correct, according to the instruction.
But I can't reach it, could it be a firewall? :S
